trans-unit.source: Defines properties that are shared by data-bound controls.

This interface provides access to properties shared by data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls.
Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary-key fields of the items that are displayed in a data-bound control.
An array that contains the names of the primary-key fields of the items that are displayed in a data-bound control.
Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to when the data source contains more than one list of data items.
The name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to.
Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
The object that contains the list of data that the data-bound control retrieves.
Gets or sets the ID of the data source control from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
The ID of the data source control that contains the list of data items that the data-bound control retrieves.
Gets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
The data source object that contains the list of data items that the data-bound control retrieves.
